blogPost.excerpt: Gawq unravels echo chambers by serving you algorithm-free news, hyper-focused on transparency, social impact and unbiased reporting. Compare the news, mute the noise, and read between the headlines from over 150+ media sources daily.
blogPost.body: Gawq unravels echo chambers by serving you algorithm-free news, hyper-focused on transparency, social impact and unbiased reporting. Compare the news, mute the noise, and read between the headlines from over 150+ media sources daily.
blogPost.title: Gawq - Unbreaking news. Stay informed, mindfully.
blogPost.author: Joshua Dziabiak

localize.description: Gawq通过为您提供无算法的新闻、高度关注透明度、社会影响和公正的报道来揭开回声室的面纱。比较新闻，让噪音静音，并从每天超过150个媒体来源的标题之间阅读。
localize.tagline: 突破性的新闻。掌握信息，心中有数。

localize.description: Gawq通過爲您提供無算法的新聞、高度關注透明度、社會影響和公正的報道來揭開回聲室的面紗。比較新聞，讓噪音靜音，並從每天超過150個媒體來源的標題之間閱讀。
localize.tagline: 突破性的新聞。掌握信息，心中有數。

previous.excerpt: Zeta Joint Cards are designed for the modern couple. Couples get a joint account and two debit cards, allowing both partners to keep tabs on their shared finances including paying bills and saving together. Our goal is to make shared banking delightful.
previous.title: Zeta Joint Cards - Shared banking for modern couples

localize.description: Zeta联名卡是为现代夫妇设计的。夫妻双方可获得一个联名账户和两张借记卡，让双方都能掌握共同的财务状况，包括共同支付账单和储蓄。我们的目标是让共同的银行业务变得更愉快。
localize.tagline: 现代夫妇的共同银行业务

localize.description: Zeta聯名卡是爲現代夫婦設計的。夫妻雙方可獲得一個聯名賬戶和兩張借記卡，讓雙方都能掌握共同的財務狀況，包括共同支付賬單和儲蓄。我們的目標是讓共同的銀行業務變得更愉快。
localize.tagline: 現代夫婦的共同銀行業務

next.excerpt: fireflies.ai & x.ai have partnered to automate the entire meeting process from scheduling to note-taking 📣 record & transcribe your x.ai meetings 🔍 search back through your conversations 📝 share recaps & notes with your team
next.title: fireflies.ai + x.ai - Record & transcribe meetings scheduled via x.ai

localize.description: fireflies.ai与x.ai合作，将整个会议流程自动化，从日程安排到记录 📣记录和抄录x.ai会议 🔍搜索回溯您的对话 📝与您的团队分享总结和笔记。
localize.tagline: 通过x.ai记录和抄写预定的会议。

localize.description: fireflies.ai與x.ai合作，將整個會議流程自動化，從日程安排到記錄 📣記錄和抄錄x.ai會議 🔍搜索回溯您的對話 📝與您的團隊分享總結和筆記。
localize.tagline: 通過x.ai記錄和抄寫預定的會議。
